## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                          | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------ | -------- | ------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Width/height of progress circle.     | `number` | `24`    |
| `width`  | `width`   | Stroke width of progress bar circle. | `number` | `4`     |
